actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to increase the authorization for the Local Public Works Capital Development and Investment Act of 1976.

summary.text: Amends the Local Public Works Capital Development and Investment Act of 1976 to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated under such Act to $6,000,000,000.

titles.title: A bill to increase the authorization for the Local Public Works Capital Development and Investment Act of 1976.
